name: Noisekiller
description:
Never before has it been more satisfying to press the left mousebutton.

Story:

It's really loud in this randomly generated thing. In order to enjoy the silence again you have to shoot everything that makes a noise.

You can acomplish this by pressing the following buttons:

WASD to move, mouse to aim, left mouse button to shoot

Features:

  • Randomly generated levels: Each Arena is unique and you can even watch how they're build!
  • Several Weapons! Like, at least four different kinds.
  • Several Enemies!
  • Great button-to-explosion transistion

If you have any questions, please get in touch with me either via email (mokkograd[at]gmail.com), or twitter (@ErnstMOKKA)
